S.FORM: Cambodia hya' ga cyux maki' tay 13 00 N, 105 00 E na Aziya' syuw. kwara' kinghciyan niya' 181,035 sq km (maki' tay 90ginkgan kin wahci') (kinwhci' niya' ga 176,515 sq km , kinwhci' na lawsayan wsilung hya' ga 4,520 sq km) Kinkhmayan kwara' squliq hya' ga 15,957,223. Pinbcyan naha' sni' naha' rhzyal hya' iy pqmahun hya' ga 32.10 , lhlahuy hya' ga 56.50 , sni' naha' sa pptzyuwaw sa bzinah hya' ga 11.40 Cambodia zik nqu ziray lga rima maki qu Cambodia bnrwan naha biru maki s Cyokok . sun nanah maha sun naha ma sun naha ma , (wiway Khmer pin tnaq nqu hngyang) maki squ sun naha maha sun naha ma babaw nqu s'agal naha squ hngiyang maha . , , , kwara smllwan naha qani ga Kambuja qu pintnaq hngyang. anan ga maki te kyopan wagi bnrwan naha squ sraral ga , maki squ kawas te 1524 qsu ba lay lalu nqu Cambodia min htuw sa bnrwan na biru kahul squ lalu Camogia naqni qu pinlawa naha squ lalu na Kokka qani. spzyang qalang na Kokka' spzyang naha' krahu' qalang hya' ga Phnom Penh. snyan kinramat inlungan na Kokka' snyan kinramat inlungan na Kokka' hya' ga 9 na tay mawpuw qutux byacing na qutux kawas. mrhuw Kokka' mrhuw Kokka' ta' misuw hya' ga Norodom Sihamoni, aring ryax 14 squ byacing tay 10 sa kawas 2004 lga, musa' spazyang balay ms'rux kya la. zyuwa na sraral maki squ kung yal 1 Sici zik nqu Camogia nyux ki'anKokka smnhi squ qani qu nyux naha galan smnhyan na kokka nyux zzik qu sinqbangan gaga na .Kokka nqu wiway yaqu qalang (Vyadhapura, : qalang nqu pqalup) misuw soni naga bih nqu qalang , maki qu llyung nqu te kyopan wagi mkura tltun mqluwi zik na bsilung squ ht'gan wagi.maki squ ziray na , , ki Cyokok ga maki qu pinkyalan naha nanak zyuwaw nqu tbziran. Kung ywan Seci Kokka hya ga wayal qolan ni mkura tltu ,laqi nqu qani ga musa mtkari squ psrux squ . babaw na nwaha qmol nqu Kokka na lga krahu ru lokah qu Kokkanya la te huk klhangan nqu qutux na Seci wal nya slqux rhyal kska ki mkura tltu Kokka Kokka na mkura tltumubuy squ rroq maki squ mkura kiluxv kyahu lliyung na ,ana yaqu misu nqu Kokka Cambodia qani uzi,Kokka ru mkura kilux qani.Ungat qu kilbahan na qutux Seci,babaw nqu lga laqiq na metswae nya kneril qu syunaw cintman nya la,taqu Kokkaqani lgakmal maha wayal mkbka lma sun naha maha hyaga teqsya ru rrhyal qu hya nyux memaw mubu nanak. babaw nqu Kung yan787kawas teqsya qalang rhyal nqu wagi qani wahan kmyat ptyaqih na pequliq squ bslung na mrhuw nqu Kokka na qani ga wayal kutan laqiq nqu mrhuw (babaw nya lga te sazing Seci)wayal kyapun la.ubuy qsya nqu aring kyalga m' nqu lasqunun mlahang kwara muzing squ te sazing Seci nqu kahul squ msbzinah mgay m'thoki nanak.Taqu te sazing Seci nqu wal nya sqtuxun squ qsya ki rrhyan nqu maki squ spzyang qalang na Kokka' ht'gan wagi mkura tltu kya wal squ30kung ri ryax nqu ,nyux psrux squ . ,mutux naha smllwan maha Kokka ,mucing squ 12 Seci krahu naqu qpzing m'smyax qu gaga naha,hitgan nqu zka ru ana yaqu gin soni nqu kwara rhyan Cambodia ki , , rhyal nqu cyugan Kokka qani.13Seci ga yaqu qu mwah smatu. kawas(1430kawas)kywpan nqu qu Cambodia,qbyangun naha qalang byacing pucing nya lga wayal naha kyopan qu .yalaw gi ki ga mksobih balay nanu ya sa qu wal naha si laxi qu mshriq squ qalang te bih na king. babaw nya lga mhhwi ru walya slaqux qu Kokka na Cambodia nyux mnaga Kokka na ,qqolan naqu sazing Kokka na ,maki squ zyuwaw na kinraral ga sun naha ma ziray nqu mnkun na Cambodia.te kyahu nqu Cambodia (maki squ lliyng )mnaki squ ziray qani ga minqolan nqu ,'mubuy squ bsyaq nqu kawas pinsqihan naha squ Kokka ki . rhyal rhyan nyux ki'an na Cambodia ga maki squ kska na rhyal mkura kilux tekyopan wagi mkura kilux kwara rhyan nya qani ga181,035ping bang kong ri rhyal nqu pqmahan hya ga 20 ,maki squ Kwara ka Kokka nqu te mkura kilux tehok tekyopan wagi qu rhyan ki'an naha te mkura tltu hya ga rgyax nqu ki qes nqu te rhyan nqu ht'gan wagi hya ga rhyan na ki Chhlong wagi rhyan ru wagi rhyan ga mksopih.mkra tekyopan wagi hya ga rgzil ru b'nux kitan bsilung:mkkita squ wan bsilung na .ryax nq makia squ rhyan nqu te mkura tltu,yaqu Kokka na rhyan na te mkura kilux myunaw ru mrsnat kwara qani ga qes na Kokka ki Kokka na Cambodia. Pspngun qu lingay na Kokka ga ini pyang karahu qu Kokka na Cambodia hya,kwara qu Kokka qani ga nyux qsugun squ 24 qalang(zik qani ga spayat qu mksobih sa bslung) atu cyugal hya ga klhangan naha nanak qu qalang naha,maki172 qu qalang,1547 rhyal.kil qruyux nqu kitan na bsilung Kokka hya ga 435 kung ri maki na qu ini ggwahi nqu rhyanl . Spyang 'llwawktan nau kktan rhyal na Kokka Cambodia ga cyux maki te ksak nqu rhyal Kokka lanuw ,llyung kiwayal myut kwara squ Kokka mkura kilux mkura tltu nqu llyung .Kska nqu be'nux rhyal Kokka rhyal ga 3 4 kwara ru ht'gan wagi mkura kilux ki te kyopan wagi nqu , musa te Kokka na rhyal rgyax qes na ru rhyal nqu ht'gan wagi kska nqu wagi qes nqu cyux ki'an na Chhlong pspngun qu kilwagiq nyaga wa yaqu k'twan nqu qqhoniq,cikuy balay qu squliq nyux naha ki'an qani. nyux ki'an rhyal qani ga rroq kinwagiq nya ga 100 kung c' nqu b'nux maha mkrayas lga,mutux ini pyunaw qu rhyal nya la.tekyopan wagi mkura kilux rgyax nqu kinwagiq nya ga wal hminas squ 1500 kung c'taqu kinwagiq na tekyopan wagi mkura kilux,pwah squ tekyopan wagi mkura tltu tehuk squ ht'gan wagi mkura kilux.rgyax nqu (Phnom Aural)hya ga spyang kinwagiq rgyx Kokka na Cambodia cyux maki sa rhyal na ht'gan wagi kinwagiq nya ga 1771kung c'. minkahul squ rgyax na nqu rgyax ,mkura squ mkura kilux ru ht'gan wagi temkura killux,kinwagiq nya ga waya squ l500 1000 kung c'.sazing rhyal qani ga wiway mt 500 700 kung c'.yuwaw nqu rhyal na mkura tltu rgyax nqu ki rhyal nqu tekyopan wagi rgyax nqu qani ga,llyung hgcyan na ,kglabang nya te huk squ Kokka be'nux na ,ga ggwahan tuqiy na . taqu spyang qryux na llyung Kokka na Cambodia ga,nyux nya saras squ cingyay na qsya qu Kokka qani.llyung na kahul squ Cyokokk qu puqing nya,ru mqluwi , ,babaw nqu Kokka na ,lga mwah myup squ Kokka na Cambodia.maki squ bih na king,rhyal nqu mkura kilux llyung Bassak,ru tehuk uzi squ tekyopan wagi mkura tltu mubuy squ langu na ,si usa mekura squ rhyan na ht'gan wagi mkura kilux,aring squ musa myup squ ksak na mkura kilux nqu bslung na Cyukok. Pinsrngyan na Kokka Spyang krahu rnaw Cyukok squ Kokka na Cambodia hya,ru msqun gmluw kbalay squ ssyan gwahan na qasu nqu .Mrhuw nqu Cambodia mkura squ tetanux nqu mmosa naha ppcywagun nanu yasa qu kinta nqu kahal tekyopan wagi qu Cambodia qani ga wiwal nqu sinqunan ru rngu na lingay Cyukok ma.makia squ spzyang qalang na Kokka',ana makai inu ga baqun mita kwara qu cingay nqu Tteluw nyux mtyuwaw nqu sseplyan. yalaw gi qpzing nqu Biw na ki zyuwaw na kinraral qani ga nyux mstiyan mzzyuwaw,ru Kokka na qani ga nyux ini psblaq minpira naha mscikuy mtciriq.mrhuw nqu Cambodia minmsblaq ini ptalax ki qsu mrhuw na Kokka na ,minnaki squ 2009 kawas tehok squ 2010 kawas ga 'nagan naha mwah rmwaw zyuwaw spyang ppqutan nqu ggalan ppila.
